Description: Yanbu Cement Co (known as: YCC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. YCC operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. It has one subsidiary operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Paper Packaging. Yanbu Cement is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in March 1977.
